GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
crypto: hisilicon/sec - don't sleep when in softirq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit c9be45e4c69fde36522274f04d1aa0d097ae3958, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 416d82204df44ef727de6eafafeaa4d12fdc78dc. For more details please see the references link.
